ADZ.MC.summary: Adolfo DomÃ­nguez, S.A. engages in the design, manufacture, acquisition, sale, marketing, import, and export of ready-made clothing, footwear, handbags and accessories, household linens, furniture products, and decorative objects. The company offers its products through stores and online under the Adolfo DomÃ­nguez brand. As of February 28, 2020, it operated 3 stores under direct management and 4 corner stores in Portugal. The company operates in Spain, Belgium, China, the United States, France, Japan, Mexico, Portugal, and the United Kingdom. The company was formerly known as Nuevas Franquicias, S.A. and changed its name to Adolfo DomÃ­nguez, S.A. in November 1996. Adolfo DomÃ­nguez, S.A. was founded in 1973 and is based in Ourense, Spain.
